name: Friends and Lovers Quiz | Name The Show | 20 Questions

questions.explanation:
The West Wing.

	Pres. Josiah 'Jed' and Dr. Abigail 'Abby' Bartlet, Leo McGarry (Chief of Staff). Played by Martin Sheen, Stockard Channing, and John Spencer.

The Flintstones.

	Fred and Wilma Flintstone, Barney Rubble. Voiced by Alan Reed, Jean Vander Pyl, and Mel Blanc.

The Honeymooners.

	Ralph and Alice Kramden, Ed Norton. Played by Jackie Gleason, Audrey Meadows, and Art Carney.

The Mothers-In-Law.

	Kaye and Roger Buell, Eve Hubbard. Played by Kaye Ballard, Roger C. Carmel, and Eve Arden.

The Dick Van Dyke Show.

	Rob and Laura Petrie, Jerry Helper. Played by Dick Van Dyke, Mary Tyler Moore, and Jerry Paris.

Battlestar Galactica.

	Apollo and Serina were married for two episodes before she was killed. He then became father to her young son, Boxey. No last names were used on the show. Apollo: Richard Hatch (not from 'Survivor'), Serina: Jane Seymour, Starbuck: Dirk Benedict.

questions.correct: Wait Till Your Father Gets Home
questions.explanation:
Wait Till Your Father Gets Home.

	Harry and Irma Boyle, Ralph wasn't given a last name. Voiced by Tom Bosley, Joan Gerber, and Jack Burns.

Quantum Leap.

	Because of the memory problems caused by time travel, Sam Beckett didn't remember he was married to Donna Eleese. Admiral Albert 'Al' Calavicci helped Sam from the future. Played by Scott Bakula, Mimi Kuzyk, and Dean Stockwell.

Full House.

	Jesse and Becky Katsopolis, Joey Gladstone. Played by John Stamos, Lori Loughlin, and Dave Coulier.

I Love Lucy.

	Lucy and Ricky Ricardo, Ethel Mertz. Played by Lucille Ball, Desi Arnaz, and Vivian Vance.

The Waltons.

	John and Olivia Walton, Ike Godsey. Played by Ralph Waite, Michael Learned, and Joe Conley.

Star Trek: Deep Space 9.

	Captain Benjamin Sisko, Kasidy Yates, and Lt. Ezri Dax. Played by Avery Brooks, Penny Johnson, and Nicole de Boer.

Married... with Children

	Al and Peg Bundy, Jefferson D'Arcy. Played by Ed O'Neill, Katey Sagal, and Ted McGinley.

Stand By Your Man.

	Rochelle and Roger Dunphy, Lorraine Popowski. Played by Melissa Gilbert, Sam McMurray, and Rosie O'Donnell.

Friends.

	Ross and Carol Geller, Chandler Bing. (Ross and Carol had just divorced at the beginning of the show, but there have been flashbacks back to their married life.) Played by David Schwimmer, Jane Sibbett, and Matthew Perry.

Eight is Enough.

	Tom Bradford, Sandra Sue 'Abby' Abbott, and Eliot Randolph. Played by Dick Van Patten, Betty Buckley, and James Karen.

The Brady Bunch.

	Carol and Mike Brady. Martha was not given a last name nor ever seen on-screen. Played by Florence Henderson and Robert Reed.

Star Trek: Deep Space 9.

	Miles and Keiko O'Brien, Dr. Julian Bashir. Played by Colm Meaney, Rosalind Chao, and Alexander Siddig.

Star Trek: Voyager.

	Lt. Tom Paris, Lt. B'Elanna Torres, Ens. Harry Kim. Played by Robert Duncan McNeill, Roxann Dawson, and Garrett Wang.

questions.text: Darrin, wife Samantha, his boss Larry.
questions.explanation:
Bewitched.

	Darrin and Samantha Stephens, Larry Tate. Darrin was played initially by Dick York, then by Dick Sargent when York fell ill. Samantha: Elizabeth Montgomery, Larry: David White.
